name: Perform inference unit evaluation on a segmentation inference unit

steps.name: Given an inference unit performing segmentation
And an image dataset in the coco format with segmentation and category_id in annotations for each image
And an evaluation plan for segmentation
When we run inference unit evaluation
Then the pixel accuracy metric for class name is calculated to be {value}
And the jaccard index metric for class name is calculated to be {value}
And the dice coefficient metric for class name is calculated to be {value}
And the report contains the metrics
And the report contains random sampled images with the predicted segmentation mask and class_names

fullName: Evaluation of Inference Unit with multiple sub units: Perform inference unit evaluation on a segmentation inference unit

labels.name: feature
labels.value: Evaluation of Inference Unit with multiple sub units
